sourcesContent:
import axios from 'axios'


const base_url = 'http://localhost:3001/persons'

const getAll = () =>
    axios
    .get(base_url)
    .then(
        response => response.data
    )

const addNew = () =>
    axios
    .post(base_url, {name:'trying to add', number: 'hardcoded btw'})
    .then(response=>response.data)


export default {getAll, addNew}
